mapper.sql: SELECT M .*, dv. NAME AS rule_name, C .address, C .detail_address, C .name as court_name, C .px, C .py FROM MATCH M LEFT JOIN dictionary_value dv ON dv.dictionary_table_code = 'team' AND dictionary_field_code = 'rule' AND M . RULE = dv.code :: INTEGER LEFT JOIN court C ON C . ID = M .court_id
mapper.select:
SELECT M .*, /*dv. NAME AS rule_name,*/ C .address, C .detail_address, C .name as court_name, C .px, C .py
, round(earth_distance(ll_to_earth(C. py, C .px), ll_to_earth(#{py}, #{px}))) AS distance
FROM MATCH M
LEFT JOIN court C ON C . ID = M .court_id
where open = true
and c.address like '%'|| #{city}||'%'
and m.rule & #{rule} > 0
and end_time < now()
and m.begin_time > #{beginDate}
and m.begin_time <= #{endDate}
and ( m.name like '%'|| #{keyword}||'%' or C .name like '%'|| #{keyword}||'%')
order by distance, m.begin_time desc
order by m.begin_time desc
limit #{rows} offset #{offset}

with v as ( SELECT id from team where src_team_id=#{teamId} and tmp is true ) select m.*, c.name as court_name from match m left join court c on c.id=m.court_id where m.team_id in (SELECT id from v) or m.accept_team_id in (SELECT id from v) order by m.begin_time desc
limit #{rows} offset #{offset}
